title: git 2.14.1 ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo.test_AnnexRepo_add_unexpected_direct_mode
body:
happened while building for sid and buster (testing) where we have atm 2.14.1-3 version of git.
```shell
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo.test_AnnexRepo_add_unexpected_direct_mode
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/build/datalad-0.9.0/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 763, in newfunc
    t(*(arg + (uri,)), **kw)
  File "/build/datalad-0.9.0/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/tests/test_annexrepo.py", line 833, in test_AnnexRepo_add_unexpected_direct_mode
    top.add('.')
  File "/build/datalad-0.9.0/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 301, in newfunc
    result = func(self, files_new, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/build/datalad-0.9.0/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 1462, in add
    to_be_added_recs = _get_to_be_added_recs(files)
  File "/build/datalad-0.9.0/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 1455, in _get_to_be_added_recs
    raise e
CommandError: CommandError: command '['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'add', '--dry-run', '-N', '--ignore-missing', '--verbose', '--', '.']' failed with exitcode 128
Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'add', '--dry-run', '-N', '--ignore-missing', '--verbose', '--', '.'] under '/tmp/datalad_temp_clone_url_m90ncP'. Exit code=128. out= err=fatal: This operation must be run in a work tree
fatal: 'git status --porcelain=2' failed in submodule subm 1
```
